reg_pit.acttitle: Oil and Gas Activities Tax Act
reg_pit.title: Administrative Penalties Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 55/2014, effective April 14, 2014.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 21, 35 (1), 36 (1), 37 (1) or (2), 39 (3) or (4), 40, 61 or 81 of the Act or, in relation to an order issued under section 49 of the Act, section 82 of the Act is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.
A person who contravenes section 35 (3) or 38 (1) (b) of the Act is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.

change.changenote: Section 2 (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 221/2018, effective October 22, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 34 or 39 (1) of the Act, or, in relation to an order issued under section 53 (2) (a) of the Act, section 82 of the Act is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 103/2020, effective May 11, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 21, 35 (1), 36 (1), 37 (1) or (2), 38 (1) (b), 39 (3) or (4), 40, 61 or 81 of the Act or, in relation to an order issued under section 49 of the Act, section 82 of the Act is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.

change.changenote: Section 4 (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 136/2021, effective May 25, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 12 (2) or 14 (2) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.
A person who contravenes section 11, 12 (1), 13, 14 (1) or 15 (1) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 4 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 136/2021, effective June 1, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 4 (1), (3) or (4) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.
A person who contravenes section 15 (2) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.
A person who contravenes section 12 (1) or (2) or 14 (1) or (2) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.
A person who contravenes section 11, 13 or 15 (1) of the Consultation and Notification Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 5 (1), (4), (5) and (6) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 267/2016, effective November 7, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 9 (1), 11 (a), 12 (1), 16 (1) (a), 17, 18 (1), 20, 51 (1), 78 (2) or (3) or 80 of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (a) or (2), 12 (2), 15 (3), 16 (1) (b) or (2), 18 (4), (5), (6), (7), (8) or (9), 19 (1) or (2), 26 (b), 27, 39 (2), 40, 41 (1) or (2), 45 (1), 47 (a), (d) or (g), 50 (1), 65 (5) or 72 (1) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.

A person who contravenes section 11 (b), 16 (3) (a), 25 (5), 28, 39 (3) or (8), 42 (2), 44 (a), (b), (d) or (e), 45 (2) or (3), 46, 47 (b), (c), (e), (f) or (h), 48, 49, 50 (2) or (3), 51 (2) or (3), 53 (a), (b) or (e), 65 (2) or 73 (1) or (2) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (b), 23 (3) (a) or (b), 25 (3), 41 (4), (5) or (6), 42 (1), 43 (1) or (2), 44 (c) (ii) or 52 (4) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 5 (3), (4) and (8) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 221/2018, effective October 22, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 55, 59 (1) or (2) (a) or 65 (4) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $200 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (a) or (2), 12 (2), 15 (3), 16 (1) (b) or (2), 18 (4), (5), (6), (7), (8) or (9), 19 (1) or (2), 26 (b), 27, 39 (2), 40, 41 (1) or (2), 45 (1), 47 (a), (d) or (g), 50 (1), 65 (5), 72 (1) or 78 (6) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.

A person who contravenes section 8 (1), 23 (2), 24, 26 (a), 31 (4) (a), (b), (e), (f) or (g), 61 (3) or 76 of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 5 (2) and (5) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 272/2019, effective December 16, 2019.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 5, 9 (2), 13, 18 (2) or (3), 21, 22, 23 (1), 39 (4), (5), (6) or (7), 41 (3), 44 (c) (i) or 74 of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.

A person who contravenes section 11 (b), 16 (3) (a), 21.1 (2), 25 (5), 28, 39 (3) or (8), 42 (2), 44 (a), (b), (d) or (e), 45 (2) or (3), 46, 47 (b), (c), (e), (f) or (h), 48, 49, 50 (2) or (3), 51 (2), (3) or (6), 53 (a), (b) or (e), 65 (2) or 73 (1) or (2) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

change.changenote: Section 5 (4), (5) and (6) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 103/2020, effective May 11, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (a) or (2), 12 (2), 15 (3), 16 (1) (b) or (2), 18 (4), (5), (6), (7), (8) or (9), 19 (1) or (2), 26 (1) (b), 27, 39 (2), 40, 41 (1) or (2), 45 (1), 47 (a), (d) or (g), 50 (1), 65 (5) or 78 (6) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.

A person who contravenes section 11 (b), 16 (3) (a), 21.1 (2), 25 (5), 28, 39 (3) or (8), 42 (2), 44 (a), (b), (d) or (e), 45 (2) or (3), 46, 47 (b), (c), (e), (f) or (h), 48, 49, 50 (2) or (3), 51 (2), (3) or (6), 53 (a), (b) or (e), 65 (2), 73 (1) or (2) or 79 (2) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (b), 21.1 (1), 23 (3) (a) or (b), 25 (3), 41 (4), (4.1), (5) or (6), 42 (1), 43 (1) or (2), 44 (c) (ii) or 52 (4) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 5 (1), (2), (4), (5) and (6) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 241/2022, effective November 25, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 9 (1), 11 (a), 12 (1), 16 (1) (a), 17, 18 (1), 20, 51 (1), 78 (1.1), (2) or (3) or 80 of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.

A person who contravenes section 5, 9 (2), 13, 18 (2) or (3), 21, 22, 23 (1), 39 (4), (5), (6) or (7), 41 (3), 44 (c) (i), 74 or 78.1 of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (a) or (2), 12 (2), 15 (3), 16 (1) (b) or (2), 18 (4), (5), (6), (7), (8) or (9), 19 (1) or (2), 26 (1) (b), 39 (2), 40, 41 (1) or (2), 45 (1), 47 (a), (d) or (g), 50 (1), 65 (5) or 78 (6) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.

A person who contravenes section 11 (b), 16 (3) (a), 21.1 (2), 25 (5), 28, 39 (3), 42 (2), 44 (a), (b), (d) or (e), 45 (2) or (3), 47 (b), (c), (e), (f) or (h), 48, 49, 50 (2) or (3), 51 (2), (3) or (6), 53 (a), (b) or (e), 65 (2), 73 (1) or (2) or 79 (2) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

A person who contravenes section 10 (1) (b), 21.1 (1), 23 (3) (a) or (b), 25 (3), 41 (4), (4.1) or (6), 42 (1), 43 (1) or (2), 44 (c) (ii) or 52 (4) of the Drilling and Production Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 6 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 213/2014, effective November 24, 2014.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 3 (1) or (3), 6 (1) (a), 9 (b) or 10 (1) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 221/2018, effective October 22, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 3 (1), 6 (1) (a), 9 (b) or 10 (1) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.
A person who contravenes section 7 (1) (a), (b) or (c) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.
A person who contravenes section 5 (1) or (2), 6 (1) (b) or 7 (1) (d) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (2) or 5 (3) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.
A person who contravenes section 4 (1), 6 (2) or (3) or 10 (2) (a) of the Pipeline and Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 6 (1) to (5) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 241/2022, effective November 25, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 3 (1), 6 (1) (a), 9 (b) or 10 (1) of the Pipeline Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.
A person who contravenes section 7 (1) (a), (b) or (c) of the Pipeline Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.
A person who contravenes section 5 (1) or (2), 6 (1) (b) or 7 (1) (d) of the Pipeline Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (2) or 5 (3) of the Pipeline Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.
A person who contravenes section 4 (1), 6 (2) or (3) or 10 (2) (a) of the Pipeline Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 6 (2.1) was added by BC Reg 241/2022, effective November 25, 2022.
Section 8 was enacted by BC Reg 55/2014, effective April 14, 2014.
Section 8 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 136/2021, effective May 25, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 6, 7, 12, 13 (1) (a), (b), (c) or (d) or (2), 15 (1), 24 or 25 of the Oil and Gas Road Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.
A person who contravenes section 5, 14 (1) (a) or (2) (a), 16 or 22 (2) of the Oil and Gas Road Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.
A person who contravenes section 8 of the Oil and Gas Road Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

A person who contravenes section 4, 9, 10, 11, 13 (1) (e), 14 (1) (b), (2) (b) or (3), 15 (2) or (3), 17, 18, 19 (4), 20 (3), 21 (1) or (3), 23 (1) or (3), 26 or 27 of the Oil and Gas Road Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 9 was enacted by BC Reg 55/2014, effective October 1, 2014.
Section 9 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 221/2018, effective October 22, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 6 or 13 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.
A person who contravenes section 4 (3), (4) or (5), 5 (2), 7 (2) or (3), 14 (1), 15 or 16 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.
A person who contravenes section 4 (2) or (6) or 10 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (1) or (2), 9 or 11 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (3) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.
A person who contravenes section 12 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $5 000.

change.changenote: Section 9 (1), (3) and (4) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 272/2019, effective December 16, 2019.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 6 or 11 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $500 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (1) or (2) or 8 of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.
A person who contravenes section 9, 13 (1) or 15 (3) or (4) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.

change.changenote: Section 9 (2) to (5) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 241/2022, effective November 25, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 5 (1), 7 (2), 12 or 15 (1) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $250 000.
A person who contravenes section 3 (1) or (2), 8 or 10 (2) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $100 000.
A person who contravenes section 9, 13 (1), 14 (2) or 15 (2), (3) or (4) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $50 000.
A person who contravenes section 13 (3) of the Emergency Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $20 000.

change.changenote: Section 10 was enacted by BC Reg 213/2014, effective November 24, 2014.
Section 11 was enacted by BC Reg 103/2020, effective May 11, 2020.
Section 12 was enacted by BC Reg 241/2022, effective November 25, 2022.
